Supporters of a separate mechanized brigade named after the knights of the winter hike keep the front line near Bakhmut. Russian invaders are trying to storm the positions of the Armed Forces daily.

This is stated in an exclusive plot fromArmy TV.

Junior Lieutenant Sergey Lipko spent the day in the trenches at zero with the brigade warriors. The infantrymen say that the enemy conducts meat storms, tries to break through the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The enemy is destroyed from small arms, machine guns, grenade launchers, FPV-Drones and drones. In case of visibility of Russian aircraft and helicopters in the area of visibility, they work on the CABC.

See the exclusive report of Sergei Lipka more about the hardest work of the Armed Forces.
